zvachose convergence: Mutsara usingaperi unonzi uchasangana zvachose kana hwerengedzo yehukoshero hwakazara hwesumnds ichipera.
mhedziso kukosha: Iko kusiri-negative kukosha kwenhamba chaiyo pasina hanya nechiratidzo chayo
alternating series: Chinyorwa chisingaperi chine mazwi anochinjana pakati pezvakanaka nezvakaipa
alternating series test: Nzira inoshandiswa kuratidza kuti inotsinhanisa nhevedzano ine mazwi anodzikira mukukosha kwakazara ndeye convergent series.
annulus: Chinhu chakaita mhete, dunhu rakasungwa nematenderedzwa maviri akakomba
antiderivative: Basa rinopatsanurika rine chitubu chakaenzana nebasa rekutanga
asymptote: Mutsara wekuti chinhambwe chiri pakati pecurve nemutsara unosvika zero seimwe kana ese ari maviri e x kana y coordination inoenda ku infinity.
nzvimbo iri pasi pe curve: Chinhu chinomiririra nzvimbo iri pakati pe curve y=f(x), x-axis, uye mitsetse yakatwasuka x=a uye x=b, apo a na b ndiwo miganhu yekubatanidza.
chain rule: Chinobva mucomposite function ndicho chitubu chebasa rekunze rinoongororwa panguva yekushanda kwemukati
differential calculus: Inoongorora chiyero chekuchinja kwehuwandu. Derivative equation inoshandiswa kutsanangura mwero weshanduko yebasa
yakazvimirira variable: Huwandu hunoshandiswa muchiitiko kana equation, kazhinji inomiririra chikonzero muhukama-nemhedzisiro.
dependent variable: Mhedzisiro kana mhedzisiro mune basa kana hukama hunochinja zvichienderana nehunhu hwehumwe huwandu
domain: Inoreva zvese zvinogoneka zvakakosha zvinogona kushandiswa sekuisa kune basa
range: Iyo seti yezvose zvinogoneka zvinobuda izvo basa rinogona kugadzira
limit: Chirevo chinotsanangudza kuti ndezvipi zvinokoshera basa rinoswedera pedyo nezvinoiswa zvichiswedera kune imwe kukosha
derivatives: Chirevo chinoyera mwero wepakarepo weshanduko kana kuteremuka kwetambo yemutsara pane imwe nzvimbo pane basa.
integral calculus: Kuwedzerwa kwecalculus kunosanganisira kutsvaga antiderivative yebasa iro rinobva kune rinopihwa
mutsara wakakosha: Kubatanidzwa kwebasa pamwe chete nemutsara we curve
surface integral: Iyo generalization yezvakasiyana-siyana zvakabatanidzwa kune zvakabatanidzwa pamusoro pepamusoro
multivariable calculus: Kuwedzerwa kwekarukusi mune imwe vhezheni kune karukusi ine mabasa ezvakasiyana zvakasiyana
vector field: Nzvimbo iri muchadenga ine ukuru negwara
vector calculus: Kuwedzerwa kwecalculus inobata nekusiyanisa uye kubatanidzwa kwevheji yemunda munzvimbo yetatu-dimensional Euclidean.
vector potential: Iyo vector munda iyo inopa kune solenoidal munda kuburikidza ne curl opareta
